title: Rosena Allin-Khan – 2021 Comments into Essex Mental Health Inquiry
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rosena Allin-Khan, the Shadow Mental Health Minister, on 21 January 2021.
content: Any inquiry must have the families of those died at its heart. They’ve been waiting years for answers and have lost faith in the system. Families have been calling for a Statutory Public Inquiry to compel people to give evidence, and are disappointed that the Minister has refused to go this far.
